Spurtcommerce has a seamless product management module where, Vendor has a choice of keeping the products active for sale or make it in-active when the product is out of stock. You can also update the prices of several products at a time, with bulk price update feature. Also, you can see the history of price changes for a product. If you want to get the list of products, you can import it into an excel sheet too.
